text: Well  said !  You are all a family to all your children no matter what tgw become 👌

Quick disclaimers (1): I was on the fence about bringing this up but figured it would be good to share where my family and I stand not only to promote good, but also to divert anyone who believes otherwise to either think about it in another way or perhaps move on from our little circle here before we officially launch. (2): I highly recommend watching The Mask You Live In, a documentary that explores culture's narrow definition of masculinity - https://youtu.be/hc45-ptHMxo
